lead.p: acosh â€” Returns the hyperbolic arc-cosine of a number.

parameters.parameter: A number equal to or greater than 1.

example.heading: acosh example
example.code: console.log(Math.acosh(1)); // 0 console.log(Math.acosh(4)); // 2.0634370688955608 console.log(Math.acosh(4.2)); // 2.113748230923511 console.log(Math.acosh(10)); // 2.993222846126381 console.log(Math.acosh(0)); // NaN
